Package com.linkedin.cubert.block

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Block
    A block of Tuples of a dataset.
    BlockWriter
    An object that writes a Block.
    CommonContext
    An adaptor class that provides a common interface to Hadoop's Mapper.Context and Reducer.Context interfaces.
    TupleCreator
    Creates Tuples from some data source.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockIterator<V>  
    BlockProperties
    Stores the meta data for a block.
    BlockSchema
    Describes the schema of a block.
    BlockUtils  
    BufferedTupleOperatorBlock
    Similar to TupleOperatorBlock, but buffer the output tuples from operator for performance profile.
    ColumnType
    Defines the schema of a column.
    ContextBlock
    A block which is backed by input data from Mapper or Reducer.
    CreateBlockOperator
    A BlockOperator that creates blocks.
    CubertBlock
    Wrapper around BlockIterator that implements the Block interface.
    EmptyBlock  
    Index
    Represents the index for relation stored in rubix format.
    IndexEntry
    Represents a single block for a relation stored in RUBIX format.
    LocalFileBlock
    A block that is backed by data read directly from a file.
    MergedTupleCreator
    Creates tuples by merging two ByteArrayTuples.
    PivotedBlock
    Provides pivoting on a block.
    ShuffleBlockWriter
    Writes a block in the SHUFFLE format.
    TupleComparator
    Compares two tuples on specified column names.
    TupleOperatorBlock
    A block that is backed by the data generated by a TupleOperator.
    TupleStoreBlock
    Provides a block interface for an underlying TupleStore, which can be SerializedTupleStore or RawTupleStore.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlockgenType
    Specifies how the tuples are accumulated within a block.
    DataType
    Supported data types by Tuples.
